long_description: The PowerTrekk Puck works with the PowerTrekk Fuel Cell charger (sold separately) to create electricity from hydrogen, with only water vapor as a byproduct. Completely passive fuel system silently converts hydrogen to electricity without fans or pumps; the chemical process creates only water vapor as a byproduct. One Puck offers 4 watt-hours (nominal). PowerTrekk Puck features 5V output at 2.5 watts; it meets industry security standards and can be taken into a plane's passenger cabin.
short_description: The PowerTrekk Puck works with the PowerTrekk Fuel Cell charger (sold separately) to create electricity from hydrogen, with only water vapor as a byproduct.
